name: German - Beginner
description: Easy German flashcards for beginners focusing on basic vocabulary and phrases.

name: Economy Principles
description: A beginner-friendly deck covering fundamental economic principles such as scarcity, opportunity cost, supply and demand, inflation, and market systems.

name: European Capitals - Beginner
description: A deck to learn the capital cities of European countries. Starts with basic pairings and can be expanded to include flags, languages, or geography later.

name: North African Capitals - Beginner
description: A deck to learn the capital cities of North African countries. Focuses on country-capital pairings.

name: Eastern European Capitals - Beginner
description: A deck to learn the capital cities of Eastern European countries. Focuses on country-capital pairings.

name: Southern European Capitals - Beginner
description: A deck to learn the capital cities of Southern European countries. Focuses on country-capital pairings.
